title: Not sure if we've mentioned this before but is top Reksai broken?
body:
So Reksai has, wave clear, CC, a free auto when he goes under ground and hits enemy champion, no mana, damage, health regeneration. Oh yeah don't forget about mobility, free teleport skill at level 6, again I'm talking about top Reksai, not jungle Reksai, so place tunnel near tower and ulti if need be. Finally we've got Reksai's ratios and damage.

My question is what champion should I play against it? How should I play against it with other champions. I have no idea what to do. Only comment if you've played against this, not just looking at stats and abilities.

replies.body: Rek'Sai is currently top/god/instaban-tier. So yeah, expect her banned or picked every game.
